Env(t=0, Pend(0, actor+None) | Pend(0, interrupter+None))
   0: actor start
   0/0: actor about to sleep
Env(t=0, Pend(0, interrupter+None) | Pend(2, actor+None))
   0: interrupter start
Env(t=0, Pend(2, actor+None) | Pend(3, interrupter+None))
   2/0: actor wakes with None
   2/1: actor about to sleep
Env(t=2, Pend(3, interrupter+None) | Pend(4, actor+None))
   3/0: scheduling interrupt
Env(t=3, Pend(4, actor+Interrupt(message)) | Pend(6, interrupter+None))
   4/1: actor interrupted with message
   4/2: actor about to sleep
Env(t=4, Pend(6, interrupter+None) | Pend(6, actor+None))
   6/1: scheduling interrupt
   6: interrupter end
Env(t=6, Pend(6, actor+Interrupt(message)))
   6/2: actor interrupted with message
   6/3: actor about to sleep
Env(t=6, Pend(8, actor+None))
   8/3: actor wakes with None
   8: actor end
